page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: My name is Sarah Church aged eleven. I wake at 7.00am have breakfast, usually cereal and a cup of tea and then get washed and dressed.I pack my school bag with my dinner,pencil case and reading book and have my long hair brushed and plaited.I leave home at 8.15am for school and arrive at 8.25am where I wait until it is open.I play tig with my friends.At 9.00am school starts and during the morning I do maths and write news.Assembly is at 10.15am and playtime at 10.45am.Dinner is 12.00 and I have my packed lunch.Then I play outside until 1.00pm.I play tig in the plantation (the trees next to the school).Today it is games and we go on to the field and practise throwing and catching and play rounders.At 2.00pm we return to school,get changed and play recorders.
